column1: Little Goat Diner////Went to Little Goat Diner on a whim with my boyfriend this past Friday night and absolutely loved it!! We both have the same tastes
column2: so we usually get two dishes and split them. This time we split the Bulls Eye French Toast and the Los Drowned "sammich" and loved them both!! I also got the caramel latte and could've probably had Â another one by the time I finished it. 10/10 would recommend this place to a friend!!
